NCS – Important Timetable Update Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c<>"",""&(Contact.Parent_Name__c)&"","Parent or Guardian")},

Please click here to see the updated timetable with the correct address: https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/assets/Southwark_C_Su_7__TT.pdf

Yours sincerely, The NCS Team – The Challenge
Phone: 0203 542 2400 Email: contact@ncsthechallenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 9am - 3pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
